name: Adrian Fann
text: We had problems with soot coming out of our gas fireplace and wind and rain coming in. We purchased a fireplace insert from Atnip and it solved our problem. We were extremely pleased with the time they took to explain the many options and the computer image of how our existing mantle would look with the chosen insert. They took time to explain the remote in detail. I would definitely recommend them

resp.text: It was our pleasure to work with you. We are glad to hear you are completely satisfied. We strive to have happy customers. Please let us know if we can help you in the future.

name: John Fishman
text: If I could give a"0" star I would. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY! We have a gas fireplace installed by Atnip at least 10 yrs ago (before we bought house). In the yrs we've been here we had them out at least once every year and it still has never worked right. Since JANUARY (!) I've been trying to schedule a service appt with them. We finally were able to schedule something today and I took the day off for it. I did miss their call - my ringer was off. But they always text and their were no texts and they said they were AT THE DOOR ready to work but no one answered it. They NEVER knocked so they were lying! Then they argued with me NOT about the lying but about my ringer being off! Typical old school Huntsville Southern business that still works as if its the '70s and there's no one else to go to. They apparently don't care about the axioms: "The customer is always right."  or "Customer comes first."  I am just ashamed I tried to work with them for so long. . AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!! We

resp.text: Our policy is to ring the doorbell and knock on the door multiple times before we proceed to call or text the homeowner. Multiple attempts were made to contact the homeowner, but we eventually had to move to the next job as contact was never made.

name: James Dint
text: Excellent service! Atnip has been around the area for as long as I can remember and I can't recommend them more. Huge showroom with lots of options to look at. I believe their installers (both named Mike if I remember correctly) were very knowledgeable and did an excellent job of installing my gas fireplace. I will continue to use them!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business! We are very blessed to have Mike and his 25+ years with us.

name: Pat Ragan
text: Just had a new gas fireplace and mantel install last week. The workman ship was great. The workers were very professional in the work they did. They were very friendly and polite. I would definitely recommend  them for your fireplace and installation needs.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business! Hope you are still enjoying your fireplace!

name: M B
text: Mike was wonderful, very knowledgeable and a perfectionist, love our new fireplace would highly recommend atnip

resp.text: Thank you very much! We are very blessed to have Mike and for 25+ years. We hope you enjoy your new fireplace. Thank you for your business!

text: Back in November I made a special order for some old Macon brick veneers  They had half of the order in stock and they said they'd order the other half I would be there in 2 weeks well I waited 2 weeks they didn't come on call me 2 more weeks still nothing I've called numerous times and been given the run around the sales person I believe is lying to me because of people in the office told me something completely different from what he said on the same day I asked both of them here it is February and I still don't have the other half of my order now my chimney is halfway done

text: It's an acme brickyard. Nuff said

name: Kelley Reischauer
text: Tanner and Kyle saved the day! I am so appreciative for the time they took to brainstorm a solution so the ginormous surround that made my fireplace look like a chalkboard won't be necessary! (The salesperson did not tell me about this huge, chalkboard-sized surround. The sales technician also didn't mention that the fan would be audible along with a sort of annoying hum. For the amount of money we spent on this system, it would have been nice if he had been clear about how exactly it would look) Anyway, thanks Kyle & Tanner!! You two are the best! My husband and I are (now) so happy with how it looks...it even makes up for the annoying fan noise. Be sure to ask for Tanner and Kyle as they are awesome! And the company should thank them as they are the reason I didn't (justifiably) lose it. Bonus: Tanner also removed a regulator  that our contractor's folks had installed inside our house after explaining the dangers of that (gotta love Alabama codes)!

name: Mel H
text: We just purchased our home in December and we could not get info from the sellers regarding proper cleaning and maintenance of the fireplace in the home. We decided before we used it, it would be best to have it cleaned (if needed) and inspected. The book time in winter is crazy busy and I believe it was about 60 days out, but given the season this is normal. Preston and Mason showed up on schedule even calling ahead to let me know they were on their way. They were polite, professional and took time to answer my questions (which I asked a lot). They cleaned the chimney, inspected it and addressed potential future concerns (issues that for now are ok but if left overtime would become a problem). I appreciated this as it gives me time to prepare to get them addressed. They did not sell me on anything not needed and provided pictures of the areas of concern. I highly recommend this company. Everyone should do annual maintenance on their chimneys/ fireplaces if they use them in winter. The price was fair for the work and service performed and We have zero complaints. Highly highly recommend!

name: Earl Campbell
text: Had the honor of this company and great technician Preston Smith come take care of my chimney. We just bought an older house and to say it hadn't been cleaned in awhile is an understatement. They came and did an immaculate job with wonderful customer service. I will definitely use them again and highly recommend. Well worth the cost.

name: Tristian Ikard
text: Preston and his coworker did an outstanding job with our chimney inspection. They were very knowledgeable and provided excellent customer service. They answered all of our questions and did not try to up sell us on things that were not needed. I will definitely continue to use their service annually for inspections and any other work. I would 100% recommended them to anyone that needs work done on their fireplace.

name: Tyler Lavena
text: A1 Chimney Specialists are an exceptional company!  From the dispatcher to the technicians it is obvious they are a very professional organization!  They are courteous, prompt and provide quality service!

name: Paul Doyle
text: I highly recommend A-1 Chimney.  They provided OUTSTANDING Service with low cost.  If it was possible to give them a 10-star rating, they deserve it.  Sam Solomon was the technician. He is professional and is a Outstanding representative for this business.

name: Kal Katrajus
text: We loved the service that was provided when we really needed it. During these times precautions were appropriate but the job got done and we are up and running again! - KK

name: Allison Block
text: The folks at A-1 are communicative, professional and accommodating.  They showed up, did the work and didn't try to push more services on me while also explaining what could be done to protect/preserve my chimney in the future.  I will definitely be calling again!

resp.text: Thank you, Allison, for the kind review! We're glad we could help!

name: Nyla McCoy
text: We called the number from Google maps.  We tried  calling several times and had a busy signal each time.

resp.text: So sorry you had this experience. Unfortunately it was out of our control - our phone system was down when you were trying to call. Everything has been fixed now though so we hope you try to call back at (256) 285-4895 between 8am and 4pm. Thanks! Bear in mind that if we are on another call, you may need to leave a message. Or you can also contact us on the website form here: https://a1chimneyspecialist.com/contact-us/

Very hard to find honest dependable workers but this company followed through.  Highly recommend.

name: Kristin Fulda
text: Called to make a service call appointment. Technician showed up on time and was very polite. Proceeded to "service" my gas fireplace by blowing dust off the logs and wiping the unit with his fingers. I offered to let him use my vacuum cleaner and attachments, which he did. Total visit was about 15 minutes. I asked what the charge would be but he didn't know. Was contacted today by the business and informed I am being charged $125 for the service call. $50 would have been a lot considering how little time and effort went into the service. I would not recommend this business.

name: Steve Smith
text:
Great owner, great staff, great products and great service.  What else could you ask for?

As the owner of a local business, I make it a point to do all I can to support other local businesses, especially those where the owner is an integral part of the business.  Ross is just that.  If there is a problem he will fix it (not that I have ever had a problem).

Just an outstanding business run by an outstanding person.

name: Local 360
text: Outstanding products and services.

name: Luis Vargas
text: Would rate a zero but can't.I was in there on May 20th 2021 at around 315 to 325. I walked in to buy a new riding lawnmower but was not greeted when I walked in nor was I acknowledged while I was looking around there were 2 people working in the store. one was with a customer the other was doing something on the computer but I wasn't even ask to wait a few minutes or anything no one said a word to me so I will just take my business elsewhere.

name: Keith West
text: Had my saw worked on they was very efficient about getting it ready.

name: M. O'Shea Butler
text: They have always had the lawn mower and DR trimmer parts and supplies that we  need to maintain our lawn care equipment. They have fast friendly service, and they are willing to answer any and all of my questions. They service lawn care equipment. Depending on what needs to be done, it may take a week or two before you get your equipment back. But you can guarantee that it will be running better than before! They will order parts and supplies for you if they don't have them in stock, just make sure you have the make and model number for your equipment.

name: Ben Skelton
text: I don’t ever leave reviews unless I’m wowed! This place is awesome. They answered all my questions and help me pick out the weed eater I needed that would best serve me and my needs. My needs to cut weeds. But they check the product to make sure it’s working before you leave, doubled my warranty for buying oil, and was easy to work with. I highly recommend Harrison for all your outdoor needs!

name: Eric Malchow
text: Bought a pole saw here, when I got home the bar was mounted on the shaft crooked and the chain was on backwards. I took it back and had them repair it. One week later I drove to South AL to clean roads and the bolt that holds the bar on was broke inside and would not allow me to take the bar off. After all this trouble with a brand new piece of equipment I figured the would replace it. Nope, second repair on something brand new. I haven't had time to use it since last repair.

name: Todd Drummer
text: Good service. Great lawn mowers.

name: Ronald Stevens
text: Sorry about the two star post I don't know how I posted it it's Google Maps doing it I really like doing business with y'all I get all my sauce and everything fixed there y'all do great work sorry for the inconvenience maybe Google Maps needs to be more careful about what they post for people I'm truly sorry

name: Jennifer Noland
text: Beware! Technician came to my house to rewire a thermostat. Once there, he told me that we had blown the transformer and fuse on the main unit and the cost at that point would be $624 to replace those 2 things and rewire the thermostat. I told him I couldn't afford that and he said "well mam I can't help you with that. There's nothing else I can do for you then." I needed my ac running so I gathered up every cent I had and told him to go ahead with the repair. He then came in and told me that the thermostat wasn't telling the unit to kick on so we must have fried the new thermostat also. He left the base plate wired up and told me that it was wired correctly and I just needed to go get a new touchpad and it would work. He is a professional and I trusted his word so I paid him the $600 and he left without it working. It was late Saturday night so I ran and got the new one first thing Sunday morning. I put it on the wall and it would not work. I had to call another repairman to come out and fix it Sunday. There was nothing wrong with the 1st thermostat. The problem was that the Jolly technician wired it wrong. Now I question everything he did that night. I feel like I paid a lot of money for absolutely nothing. I have called twice and cannot get a call back. I should have refused to pay but I trusted this guys word. I will not make that mistake again. Please be careful when dealing with this company!!!!

name: Martin Agnew
text:
While in the process of selling my home, a technician came out to inspect my fully functioning unit. After leaving, my unit was no longer pushing air through the house and there was a pungent burning smell. I contacted Jolly, but no assistance was offered without a $150 service call charge plus the cost of parts, which he said would run around $2,500. He then quickly solicited me to instead consider buying a new unit from them instead of paying the $2,500 to repair the unit.

The next day I had a technician from another HVAC company come to look at the unit and they said the report Jolly had written was nearly entirely false, and the reason the unit was no longer working was because the technician from Jolly did not reconnect the blower wheel.

Not only might this affect the sale of my home, but my wife and 18 month old daughter were forced to stay somewhere else because they had no heat in the middle of December.

resp.text:
Mr. Agnew,
Anytime you have an issue with a price, you can always call the office during normal business hours and talk to our Office Manager.  She is always here willing to help.  I cannot confirm what the other company you called out found.  I trust my technicians and their expertise more than any other company.  An inspection took place and the proper pictures are on file from that inspection.  All paperwork supports the repairs noted in the inspection.

name: Julie Lewis
text: I am so thankful for Jolly Heating & Air.  I called them about a problem with my A/C unit and they were at my house within the hour. I have 2 children who would have been frozen in our cold winter if it wasn't for them coming out so quickly. Thank you for your speedy service! Will definitely use again and will recommend to anyone who needs work done quickly.

While the two employees working the office could not provide a solution to my issue they asked for me to leave my contact information with them, and provided the business card for a coworker that might be able to help. I was told they would have that person give me a call to set up an appointment to have someone come out to my house to see if they can troubleshoot my issue and possibly come up with a solution. After nearly a week there has been no communication from them. Instead, I had to call the person on the business card only to then be told he was not the right person and that he needed to have someone else call me back instead. Still waiting on that call back. My problem is that I bought a set of glass fireplace doors for my fireplace that I should be able to easily install myself, but they do not fit by just a few millimeters in height. I have double checked that I got the correct doors. I know the manufacturer and model number of my fireplace, so I bought the coordinating doors for my fireplace. I am worried that the fireplace and/or tile surround was not done properly and therefore might be the cause of my issue. Please beware this company installs the fireplaces and does the tile/brick work for Lowder New Homes, so if you are a Lowder homeowner you could run into similar issues in the future!!

name: Robert Cofer
text: Overhead was fantastic. I purchased a fireplace and it is beautiful. I had a slight problem with a piece of the hardware from the manufacturer and it took some time to resolve- but instead of leaving me out and cold (pun intended) Kayla and staff brought me out a brand new burner while they sorted out warranty with the manufacturer. That’s the sort of customer service that leaves you feeling warm inside (intended again). Will do business with them again and recommend to anyone that may be able to serve.

resp.text: Thank you for the favorable review Robert!  We do have things go wrong occasionally, but we do our best to make it right!

text: The best. They live here and they work here. Buy from them.

name: Thomas Locke
text: Everyone I spoke with from Heather, who scheduled my service call to Kevin, who actually performed the replacement procedure were wonderful,  friendly, and extremely knowledgeable about all things garage door related. Kevin went so far as to inspect and snug every single bolt on the door and he wasn't even there for that. After this initial experience,  Overhead Door and Fireplace will be the only company I use when my garage door needs attention.  Prices were very fair, especially considering the danger involved and Kevin knocked it out in 20 mins! I can't say enough about this company. Would most definitely recommend to others.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your favorable review.  We look forward to serving you in the future and appreciate your business!

An appreciative and satisfied customer,
